title: Cafe Fleur
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Organic, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, European, French, German, Spanish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An old cozy relaxing cafe close to central places in the city, such as  Rudolfplatz, Neumarkt, Zulpicherplatz. In the mornings they play classical music and in the evening relaxed modern music. Has some vegan choices on the daily menu. Has a vegan breakfast, vegan pancakes, soy milk and once a week a vegan cake. Servers know what vegan means and some are vegan or vegetarian themselves.
